summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2180 for the improvement of Lenora Street, from Westlake Avenue to the alley between Ninth Avenue and Terry Avenue; and Ninth Avenue, from Westlake Avenue to Virginia Street, all in the City of Seattle, by planking the same to a width of twenty (20) feet, and by the construction of wooden sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 21739, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
